titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Population Council records, Index FA775

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-22 04:38:13 -0400.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Population Council Index provides indexing to the Council's General File (1952-1961) and the Council's Central Files (1961-1976), which include the Administration File, Foreign Correspondence, Grant Files, Organization File, and Subject File.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The index is arranged in three series: 1. General File Index (1952-1961); 2. Central File Index (1961-1976); and 3. Central File Title List (1961-1976).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Index cards are open for research.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Population Council records were initially transferred to RAC by the Council in 1976, with periodic accretions to the collection as necessary.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Population Council retains title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection for scholarly purposes. The Population Council retains the right to prior consent with respect to any reproduction or extensive quotation of the records for publication.

Reproduction/duplication of archival items is routinely provided in accordance with "fair use". If the RAC does not hold copyright for an archival collection, or items within a collection, it is the users responsibility to contact the copyright holder, or make a fair effort to do so, prior to publication.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Population Council's General File Index provides indexing to be found in FA210 Population Council records Accession 1, Series 1: General File, 1952-1961
Individual documents are indicated on the index cards by the alphabetically arranged file titles within the General File.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: From 1952-1961 the Population Council maintained a single 'General File' of correspondence, memoranda, and reports, arranged alphabetically by file title. Indexing was provided by the General File Index, which included headings for personal names and organizations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Provides indexing to the Population Council's Central Files, which includes the Administration File, Foreign Correspondence, Grant Files, Organization File, and Subject File.
The Population Council's Central Files can be found in both:

odd.head: General
odd.p: The Central Files Index cards use notations to indicate specific records series within the Population Council's Central Files. See the key below to decipher these notations.

list.head: Key to Central File Index notations

defitem.label: "AD - (name) - (file title)"
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 3. Administration File

defitem.label: "Admin. - (name) - (file title)"
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 3. Administration File

defitem.label: "D (YY).(###)" (Grant ID number, Demographic Division)
defitem.item: Search DIMES for the grant ID number.

defitem.label: "D&I - AD - (name) - (file title)"
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 3. Administration File

defitem.label: "D&I - O (file title)", dated from 1961-1966
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 1 (FA210), Series 1. Organization File

defitem.label: "D&I - O (file title)", dated from 1967-1976
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 4. Organization File

defitem.label: "D&I - S (file title)", dated from 1961-1966
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 1 (FA210), Series 5. Subject File

defitem.label: "D&I - S (file title)", dated from 1967-1976
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 4. Subject File

defitem.label: "FC - (country name) - (file title)"
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 2. Foreign Correspondence

defitem.label: "M (YY).(###)" (Grant ID number, Biomedical Division)
defitem.item: Search DIMES for the grant ID number.

defitem.label: "O - (file title)", dated from 1961-1966
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 1 (FA210), Series 4. Organization File

defitem.label: "O - (file title)", dated from 1967-1976
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 4. Organization File

defitem.label: "S - (file title)", dated from 1961-1966
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 1 (FA210), Series 5. Subject File

defitem.label: "S - (file title)", dated from 1967-1976
defitem.item: See: Population Council records, Accession 2 (FA432), Series 4. Subject File

defitem.label: "T (YY).(###)" (Grant ID number, Technical Division)
defitem.item: Search DIMES for the grant ID number.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: In 1961-1962 the Population Council contracted Records Management Research to review the Council's filing system and make recommendations. Following this review the Council established a Central Files Unit to receive and file documents under specific subject titles, and to maintain a card index system for documents cross-referencing. The Council's Central Files Unit maintained several series of records, including the Administration File, Foreign Correspondence, Grant Files, Organization File, and Subject File.
The Central File unit was in operation until 1976, when inactive Population Council records were transferred to the Rockefeller Archive Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series provides lists of files found in the Population Council's Central Files, but is not an index to those files.
